pilotos/biografia: In this path there is information about the lives of different Formula 1 drivers who belonged to the Aston Martin, Ferrari, McLaren or Mercedes brands
pilotos/titulos: In this path there is information about titles, achievements and records of different Formula 1 drivers who belonged to the Aston Martin, Ferrari, McLaren or Mercedes brands
historia/empresa: In this path there is information about the history of the Aston Martin, Ferrari, McLaren or Mercedes brands
historia/equipo_formula1: In this path there is information about the history of Aston Martin, Ferrari, McLaren or Mercedes in Formula 1
modelos/ferrari: In this path there is information about car models of the brands Ferrari
modelos/mclaren: In this path there is information about car models of the brands Mclaren
modelos/mercedes: In this path there is information about car models of the brands Mercedes
modelos/aston_martin: In this path there is information about car models of the brands Aston Martin
